definition: the Emperor's body/Jesus' body/communion wafer (in Christian mass)
Corpus Christi (Catholic festival on second Thursday after Whit Sunday)
Corpus Christi (Catholic festival on second Thursday after Whit Sunday)
the body and blood of Christ/Holy communion

sentences.english: Mysteries The consecrated elements of the Eucharist.
sentences.chinese: 聖體聖餐中被奉爲神聖的成分。

sentences.english: The Eucharist is Jesus' greatest expression of His love for us.
sentences.chinese: 聖體聖事是耶穌對我們的愛，最偉大的表達。

sentences.english: The same Redeemer is present in the sacrament of the Eucharist.
sentences.chinese: 也是這位救主，臨在於聖體聖事當中。

sentences.english: There is no celebration of the Eucharist on this day.
sentences.chinese: 有沒有慶祝聖體聖事的這一天。

sentences.english: Strong identification marks of the Eucharist, it is in line with the brand temperament.
sentences.chinese: 標誌聖體識別性強，很符合品牌氣質。

sentences.english: Feel as though you're standing by a priest as he acts as celebrant during Eucharist.
sentences.chinese: 感覺好像你是一個牧師，他的行爲是在聖體禮的地位。

sentences.english: It's okay if you just come to listen.
sentences.chinese: 只有加入教會的人，他們纔可以去領聖體。

sentences.english: Father Conmee raised his hat to the Blessed Sacrament.
sentences.chinese: 神父衝着聖體摘下帽子。

sentences.english: He attended the Pope's msaa and received communion from his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他參與教宗舉行的彌撒及由教宗親手送聖體。

sentences.english: I pulled out the wine and wafer to show that God forgives us all our sins.
sentences.chinese: 我拿出聖體和聖酒，表示天主可以赦免我們的罪。

sentences.english: Why is the Blessed Eucharist the greatest and noblest of the sacraments ?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼說聖體是至尊至大的聖事呢？

sentences.english: As a Christian, Dong Dong goes to a church. There he neither repents nor takes the bread and wine.
sentences.chinese: 信仰基督的鼕鼕來到教堂，卻既未懺悔也沒領聖體。

sentences.english: They deny the real presence in the Lord's Supper.
sentences.chinese: 他們否認聖餐中聖體同在。

sentences.english: This is because 24 hours a day, we touch Christ in the Eucharist.
sentences.chinese: 因爲，一天24小時，我們都在觸摸基督的聖體。

sentences.english: The tabernacle was made of the finest material.
sentences.chinese: 聖體盤是用最好的材料做的。

sentences.english: The Church and the world have great need of Eucharistic adoration .
sentences.chinese: 教會和世界都極之需要朝拜聖體。

definition: altar lamp burning day and night
